Title: Establishes the crime of assault on a food delivery person
Summary: Establishes the crime of assault on a food delivery person as a class E felony; defines a food delivery person to mean a person employed by a restaurant or food delivery service or put into service by a restaurant to deliver prepared food to a location outside the restaurant pursuant to an order placed by the purported recipient of the food.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the penal law, in relation to assault on a food delivery person
